messages.content: We're at the McDonald's and there's an issue, I need help.
Copy that, can you describe the issue further?
There's a group causing a lot of trouble here, I need someone to come quickly!
Copy. Dispatching units to your location. Are there any weapons involved?
No weapons that I can see, but they're getting really aggressive.
Understood. Units are on their way. Stay on the line with me.
314 and 315, respond to a civil issue at 705 North Telluride Street, unit A.

Anonymous caller reports two individuals living in a storage unit there. Looking for a white male named Donnie, about 30 years old, and a white male child named Bill, about 6 years old. Associated vehicle is a brown Chevy pickup, no plate.
324: Check Hamden and Dowell, Chase parking lot, Colorado passenger 1-200.
302: Respond to Moline Apartments, 1390 North Moline Street. Possible altercation involving eight males in a truck trying to jump the daughter's boyfriend, now possibly near Central High School.
314: Can we get better address details?
314: I'm not finding any storage places.
302: RP can't provide descriptions but mentions suspect named Ronnie. He might be in the area.
Clearing the area near Love and Newark.
Advising not with the Indian suspect, but another involved party might be in a northern suburb.
Stand by, I need to check. We don't have the full story yet.
Can you determine if they might be Pacific Islander?
Norado and x-ray. Static on the plate.
316 and 317 for a fight at the preserve, 1036 South El Cartway. 3 men in a parking lot.
302 or any other car, 11th and Newark status?
316, 317, only one caller. Originally reported 3 individuals, now thinks there might be 2. One in a white shirt and red shorts, the other in a white shirt and no-color pants.
Heading there, will be there in a minute.
315 and 314, report of a shooting at Century Theaters, 14300 East Alameda Avenue. Someone reported shooting inside the auditorium.
Units responding to the shooting, switch to remain on Channel 2. All others back to normal.
All available units, respond to the theater, 14-300 East Alameda Avenue.
Engine 8, Battalion 1 on a shooting, 9 George 2, east side.
Still active shooter inside, need backup.
Lincoln 25, need backup on the back side as well.
